docs.text: Instructions for developers Development environment In order to minimize the contribution barrier, I mkdocs mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.
